Package org.jsfml.audio

Contains classes related to audio playback and recording.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConstSoundBuffer
    Read-only interface for sound buffers.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Listener
    Represents the point in the scene from where all the sounds are heard and provides funcionality to modify it.
    Music
    Provides functionality to play music streams from common audio file formats.
    Sound
    Provides functionality to instantiate a SoundBuffer and play a buffered sound.
    SoundBuffer
    Buffer of audio samples, providing an audio data source for a Sound.
    SoundBufferRecorder
    A SoundRecorder which stores captured audio data into a SoundBuffer.
    SoundRecorder
    Abstract base class for sound recorders, which provide functionality to capture audio data.
    SoundSource
    Abstract base class for playable sound sources.
    SoundStream
    Abstract base class for streamed sound sources.
    SoundStream.Chunk
    Represents a chunk of audio data provided by a SoundStream when new data is requested.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SoundSource.Status
    Enumeration of possible sound source states.

Package org.jsfml.audio Description

Contains classes related to audio playback and recording.
